q1.name: Stretching Strikes
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zac''' stretches his left arm in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} the first enemy hit by 40% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, and {{tip|tether|attaching}} it to the target for 2 seconds and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for the duration while the tether persists.

While his arm is attached, his next [[basic attack]] is replaced by a second ''Stretching Strike'' and gains {{sti|200 range}}, dealing the same {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow}} after a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time, but without being able to {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}.

If the two ''Stretching Strikes'' affect different targets, he {{tip|root|roots}} both targets for {{tt|{{fd|0.5}}|Estimated}} seconds and then {{tip|airborne|flings}} them towards each other for 300 range.

If the two targets are {{tt|near|700 range}} each other, they're instead slammed against each other, both taking the initial {{as|magic damage}} and applied the {{tip|slow}} again and also becoming {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% of '''Zac's''' '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|40*2 to 100*2}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of '''Zac's''' '''maximum''' health)}}}}
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block a single instance of damage only.
* If the {{tip|tether|attached}} target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} during the second ''Stretching Strike'' via basic attack, they are not {{tip|airborne|flinged}} nor {{tip|root|rooted}}. The target will still take damage however.
* {{Pending for test}}: Parry interactions ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).
* {{Pending for test}}: {{sti|Attack range}} modifiers ({{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}).
q1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{as|8%|health}} as 8 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0

w1.name: Unstable Matter
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zac's''' body explodes outward, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies, capped against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
'''Zac''' grants {{tip|ghost|ghosting}} to monsters hit for 5 seconds.
''Unstable Matter's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 1 second every time '''Zac''' picks up a {{ai|Cell Division|Zac}} chunk.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|25 to 85}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4 to 8}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Capped Damage|{{ap|225 to 285}}}}

e1.name: Elastic Slingshot
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zac''' {{tip|channel|charges}} up to {{fd|4.5}} seconds, increasing ''Elastic Slingshot's'' {{sti|range}} over a cone in the target direction. ''Elastic Slingshot'' can be recast at any time within its duration.

If '''Zac''' {{tt|cancels the channel|Details below}} himself, or the charge completes without reactivation, 50% of ''Elastic Slingshot's'' {{sti|{{as|health cost}}}} and {{sti|cooldown}} are refunded.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Zac''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{passive progression/deprecated version|2|changedisplay=true|type=duration of the charge|0.5|1|0|X}} seconds.
e1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{as|4%|health}} as 4 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0

r1.name: Let's Bounce!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zac''' bounces 4 times over 3 seconds, gaining {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|7|type=duration|key=%|20 to 50|0 to 3}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, but becoming unable to declare basic attacks and use {{ai|Stretching Strikes|Zac}} and {{ai|Elastic Slingshot|Zac}} for the duration. There is a 1-second delay between each bounce.
Each bounce deals {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} for 1 second and subsequently {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 20% for the same duration.
Enemies can be damaged by multiple bounces, with each beyond the first dealing 50% damage but not {{tip|airborne|displacing}} them.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|140 to 280}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|140/2 to 280/2}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Target Damage|{{ap|140*2.5 to 280*2.5}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} only blocks a single instance of damage.
* Entering {{tip|stasis}} will end ''Let's Bounce!'' prematurely.
